text: Geschwader Fledermaus (Bat squadron) is an East German film. It was released in 1958. ==Cast== *Wolfgang Heinz - General Lee *Christine Laszar - Flessy *Günther Simon - Tex Stankowsky *Kurd Pieritz - Mitch Bryk *Norbert Christian - Terry Varney *Hans-Walter Clasen - Andy West *Werner Lierck - Sam Kirby *Otto Stark - Leo Cayman *Gerhard Frei - Percy Brown *Horst Schön - Smart Lewis *Dom de Beern - John Cainfield *Wolf Martini - Colonel D'Allard *Thi Hoa Nguyen - Thao *Benno Bentzin - Lieutenant Matthieu *Johannes Knittel - Lieutenant Lambert ==External links== * Category:1958 films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:First Indochina War films Category:German aviation films Category:Films with screenplays by Hans Székely
title: Geschwader Fledermaus
